#labels Terrain
cobbles-snow - snowy cobblestone path

rock-brown-snow - rock partially covered with snow

water-deep - impassably deep water

cobbles - a nice cobblestone path

wall - a brick wall you can not walk over

dirt - dirt paths are a mainstay of medieval transportation

forest - a dense forest you cannot walk through

grass-dry - this grass is thirsty

grass-green - this grass is nice and lush, and is the default terrain

rock-brown-hole - rock with a cave

rock-brown - common mountainside

sand - common beach

snow - a deep drift of snow

cave - underground terrain

void - 'edge of the map', impassible, use with caution

water - a ford you can wade through
